snippet.title: HEAVYPOLY  | Blender Everyday
snippet.description:
Meet HEAVYPOLY (also known as Vaughan Ling). You've probably seen his work on The Witness (Netflix's Love, Death, & Robots), Ubisoft's Watch Dogs: Legion cinematic or have used HEAVYPAINT.

Questions: https://blender.community/c/today/K6fbbc/

Vaughan elsewhere:
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/Heavypoly
* Instagram: https://instagram.com/heavypoly/
* Website: http://www.heavypoly.com/
* YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKaDsTgIcEMPtvHPRhU-Mvg
* HEAVYPAINT: http://www.heavypoly.com/heavypaint

snippet.title: SWITCH TO BLENDER with DANIEL BYSTEDT | Blender Everyday
snippet.description:
Are you or a friend thinking on switching to Blender? This show is for you! Legend Daniel Bystedt will be sharing his experience with other softwares and advice on making the switch. Leave your questions on https://blender.community/c/today/vjfbbc/!

Daniel's links:
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/3DBystedt
* ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/dbystedt
* YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/morriscowboy/

snippet.title: CAPTAIN DISILLUSION | Blender Everyday #09
snippet.description:
A Captain is in the house! Well, remotely, like we should all be. Let's see up close how the World's Greatest Blenderer actually uses Blender to debunk the misteries of the interwebs. As a backup we can also get Alan, Captain's intern.

Ask questions at: https://blender.community/c/today/Nbfbbc/

Captain Disillusion links:
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/CDisillusion

snippet.title: NODES SPECIAL ü™ê Blender Everyday #07
snippet.description:
The next big thing: NODES FOR EVERYTHING. To talk about this no one better than the developer of Animation Nodes & Everything Nodes himself: Jacques Lucke! Joining us is the master of actually using those nodes: Simon Thommes!

Questions: https://blender.community/c/today/tZdbbc/

* Jacques https://twitter.com/JacquesLucke
* Simon https://twitter.com/simonthommes

Demo files used:
* Simon's microbe (needs latest 2.83 alpha) https://cloud.blender.org/p/gallery/5e82012814442339fd1d7cd2
* surface_blend_particles(needs functions branch) http://pasteall.org/blend/index.php?id=53115
* image_blend_particles (needs functions branch) http://pasteall.org/blend/index.php?id=53116
* Get Functions Blender branch: https://builder.blender.org/download/branches/

==
